text: Ara muhajira o anasaradera madhye yara prathama agragami [1] ebam yara ihasanera sathe tadera anusarana kare [2] allahâ€Œ tadera prati santusta hayechena ebam tara'o tamra upara santusta hayechena [3]. Ara tini tadera jan'ya tairi karechena jannata, yara nice nadi prabahita, sekhane tara cirasthayi habe. E to mahasaphalya
